page.title: 16Housing.
page.content: Preservation of buildings. The children asked the people which buildings they thought were of Historical or Architectural interest. Six buildings were mentioned, The Post Office, (thatched) Mr. Biles Cottage (thatched) The Royal Oak pub, Gould's Farm, Crown House (old coaching stop), Tilly Whim (thatched). Nineteen other buildings or sites were also mentioned, The Vicarage, Milborne Farm house, Blandford Hill Cottages, Deverel House, Frogmore House, Cottage Green, Garden Cottage, Waterwheel (Waterbarn Lane), Pumping Station, Woodville, School house (The square), Saddlers shop (the square), the Chapel, Stag House, Button Factory, Wetherby Castle (earthworks and Obelisk), the Church and School.
